test suite.name: AA
test suite.description: All the test available for this entity

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the iss claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the iss claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the sub claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the sub claim in it is checked

test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id claim in it is checked

test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the iat claim in it is checked.

test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the logo_uri claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the exp claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the exp claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the ref claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the ref claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the organization_type claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the organization_type claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the id_code claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id_code claim in it is checked.

test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the email claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the organization_name claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the organization_name claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the issued oauth_resource Trust Mark contain the policy_uri claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for an AA (oauth_resource profile) must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the policy_uri claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the issued oauth_resource Trust Mark contain the tos_uri claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for an AA (oauth_resource profile) must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the tos_uri claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the issued oauth_resource Trust Mark contain the claims claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for an AA (oauth_resource profile) must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the claims claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the issued oauth_resource Trust Mark contain the service_documentation claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for an AA (oauth_resource profile) must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the service_documentation claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the entity configuration of a considered entity return a Federation Metadata in JOSE format when an HTTP GET request is made to its .well-known/openid-federation endpoint
test.description: The considered entity must have published its entity configuration in the .well-known/openid-federation endpoint. So in this test, an HTTP GET request is made to the entity's .well-known/openid-federation endpoint (appended to the URL which identifies the entity) and the response is analyzed. This response has to be the entity configuration of the entity and therefore a Federation Metadata in JOSE format (Content-Type: application/entity-statement+jwt)

test.name: Does the Entity expose the resolve entity statement endpoint
test.description: In order to check the presence and correctness of the resolve entity statement endpoint, an HTTP GET request containing the parameters 'sub', 'anchor' and 'type' is made to the entity's endpoint and an HTTP 200 OK response containing the resolved metadata for the entity in the request's sub claim is expected.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain correct value for organization_type claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the organization_type claim can be 'public' or 'private'

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain incorrect token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must not contain the values ['none', 'HS256', 'HS384', 'HS512']

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain incorrect dpop_signing_alg_values_supported claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the dpop_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must not contain the values ['none', 'HS256', 'HS384', 'HS512']

test.name: Does the metadata contain the organization_name claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the organization_name claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the homepage_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the homepage_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the contacts claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the federation_resolve_endpoint claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_resolve_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the federation_trust_mark_status_endpoint claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_trust_mark_status_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the issuer claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked.

test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked.

test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the op_policy_uri claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked.

test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the op_tos_uri claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked.

test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the resource claim in the 'oauth_resource' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the iss parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the sub parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the sub parameter is checked

test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iat parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the metadata parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the metadata parameter is checked

test.name: Does the OP's entity configuration contain the authority_hints parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the OP is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the authority_hints parameter is checked

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain the trust_marks parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the trust_marks parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the entity correctly sign the Entity Configuration
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken and the three parts of the JWT (header, payload and signature) are base64url decoded. Finally, the signature is validated passing the public key (n, e of jwks parameter that must be taken from the Entity Statement of a superior), the JWS Signature (received signature base64url decoded) and the JWS signing input (header and payload base64url encoded and concatenated with a dot dividing them) to a signature verifier configured for the algorithm described in the Entity Configuration Header

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain a correctly signed trust_marks
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken. The three parts of the JWT (header, payload and signature) composing the trust marks are base64url decoded. Finally, the signature is validated passing the public key (n, e of jwks parameter), the JWS Signature (received signature base64url decoded) and the JWS signing input (header and payload base64url encoded and concatenated with a dot dividing them) to a signature verifier.

test.name: Does the Entity expose the /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint
test.description: In order to check the presence and correctness of the /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint, an HTTP GET request to the entity's endpoint is done and its entity configuration is expected as response.

test.name: Does the entity return a correct HTTP code in the EC response
test.description: In this test a correct request to the entity's /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint is made and the response is analyzed. It must be an HTTP 200 OK response

test.name: Does the Entity expose the resolve entity statement endpoint
test.description: In order to check the presence and correctness of the resolve entity statement endpoint, an HTTP GET request containing the parameters 'sub', 'anchor' and 'type' is made to the entity's endpoint and an HTTP 200 OK response containing the resolved metadata for the entity in the request's sub claim is expected.

test.name: Does the entity return a correct Content-Type in the EC response
test.description: In this test a correct request to the entity's /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint is made and the response is analyzed. It must have a Content-Type parameter set to application/entity-statement+jwt

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'openid_relying_party'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'openid_provider'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'federation_entity'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'oauth_authorization_server'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one  'oauth_resource'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked. It must identify the issuing entity.

test.name: Does entity configuration OP contain a correct sub parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the sub parameter is checked. Its value must be equal to the one in the iss parameter

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must contain the key-value pair ['private_key_jwt']

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked to be ['RS256', 'RS512'].

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct dpop_signing_alg_values_supported claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the dpop_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is 'one_of': ['RS256', 'RS512']

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct iss parameter type
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked. It must be a Number.

It must be JSON Object that contains keys, which is a JSON Array, which contains at least kty, which is a string

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct jwks parameter type for IT
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the jwks parameter is checked. It must contain at least KID.

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain a JSON Object
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object.

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only allowed types
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the OP's entity configuration contain a correct authority_hints parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the OP is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the authority_hints parameter is checked, it must be an array

test.name: Does the OP's entity configuration contain a correct authority_hints parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the OP is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the authority_hints parameter is checked, it must be an array

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain a correct trust_marks parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the type of the trust_marks parameter is checked. It must be an array

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain a correct trust_marks parameter value
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the type of the trust_marks parameter is checked. It MUST contain id (string) AND trust_mark (JWT).

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct organization_name claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the organization_name claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It must be a String.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct homepage_uri claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the homepage_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It must be an URL.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct policy_uri claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the policy_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It must be an URL.

test.name: Does the metadata contain correct type logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the TA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the logo_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is a String.

test.name: Does the metadata contain a correct logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the TA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the logo_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is an HTTPS URL with an .svg file

test.name: Does the metadata contain correct type contacts claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the contacts claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is a JSON Array of String.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct federation_resolve_endpoint claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_resolve_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It MUST be an URL.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct federation_resolve_endpoint claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_resolve_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It MUST be an HTTPS URL that ends with /trust_mark_status.

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain at least federation_entity and oauth_resource
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_entity and oauth_resource is checked

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct federation_trust_mark_status_endpoint claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_trust_mark_status_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It MUST be an URL.

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct federation_trust_mark_status_endpoint claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_trust_mark_status_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It MUST be an HTTPS URL that ends with /trust_mark_status.

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain a correct type of issuer claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the issuer claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is a URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain a correct type of issuer claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the issuer claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an HTTPS URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain a correct type of issuer claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the issuer claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is a URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type authorization_endpoint claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the authorization_endpoint claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is "private"

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type token_endpoint claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the token_endpoint claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type token_endpoint claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the token_endpoint claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an HTTPS URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct jwks claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the jwks claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Object that contains keys, which is a JSON Array, which contains at least kty, which is a string

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct jwks claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the jwks claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Object that contains keys, which is a JSON Array, which contains kid, which is a string

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct scopes_supported claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the scopes_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Array

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct response_types_supported claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the response_types_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Array

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct grant_types_supported claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the grant_types_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Array

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Array

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain the correct token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim type
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Array

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type op_policy_uri claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the op_policy_uri claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type op_policy_uri claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the op_policy_uri claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an HTTPS URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type op_tos_uri claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the op_tos_uri claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an URL

test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the op_policy_uri claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an HTTPS URL

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type dpop_signing_alg_values_supported claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the dpop_signing_alg_values_supported claim in the 'oauth_authorization_server' entity type is an JSON Array

test.name: Does the AA metadata contain correct type resource claim
test.description: In this test the AA metadata in the AA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the resource claim in the 'oauth_resource' entity type is an HTTPS URL
